channel.title: Rocco's LinkedIn SSI Micro-Posts
channel.description: Increase your Social Selling Index score with actionable insights

item.title: Rocco's LinkedIn SSI: Micro-tip 1
item.description:
Polish Your Profile Picture

You wouldn't show up to an interview in your pajamas (hopefully). Your profile photo is your first impression.

Make it clear, professional, and smile like you just passed all your unit tests on the first try.

Follow me or drop a message if you’re unsure about your current photo!
item.dc:creator: xdemocle
